cn.brainit.image

类 GrayScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.brainit.image.GrayScale

  • public class GrayScale
extends java.lang.Object
    In photography and computing, a grayscale or greyscale digital image is an image in which the value of each pixel is a single sample, that is, it carries only intensity information. more info :https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grayscale
    作者:
    brainit brainit http://www.brainit.cn/

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  GrayScale.Component
      when gray scale the Image with component different component can be choose including red ,green ,blue
      class  GrayScale.WeightedMean
      Calssic Weight of method toGrayImageWithWeightMean()

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static int formatGray(int gray)
      format gray of one pixel if gray<0 format: gray=0 if gray>255 format: gray=255
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Testing method
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage toGrayImageWithAverage()
      gray scale image with average of RGB gray = (R + G + B)/3
      void toGrayImageWithAverage(java.io.File output)
      output data to file get the BufferedImage after editing with method toGrayImageWithAverage() output the buffereImage to destFile
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage toGrayImageWithComponent(int componentType)
      gray scale image with component of RGB gray = (R | G | B)
      void toGrayImageWithComponent(int componentType, java.io.File output)
      output data to file get the BufferedImage after editing with method toGrayImageWithComponent() output the buffereImage to destFile
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage toGrayImageWithMax()
      gray scale image with max of RGB gray = max(R,G,B)
      void toGrayImageWithMax(java.io.File output)
      output data to file get the BufferedImage after editing with method toGrayImageWithMax() output the buffereImage to destFile
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage toGrayImageWithWeightedMean(double redWeight, double greenWeight, double blueWeight)
      gray scale image with WeightedMean of RGB gray = aR + bG + cB; commonly:a + b + c = 1; a>=0;b>=0;c>=0
      void toGrayImageWithWeightedMean(double redWeight, double greenWeight, double blueWeight, java.io.File output)
      output data to file get the BufferedImage after editing with method toGrayImageWithWeightedMean() output the buffereImage to destFile

      • toGrayImageWithWeightedMean

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage toGrayImageWithWeightedMean(double redWeight,
                                                       double greenWeight,
                                                       double blueWeight)
        gray scale image with WeightedMean of RGB gray = aR + bG + cB; commonly:a + b + c = 1; a>=0;b>=0;c>=0
        返回:
        the bufferedImage after editing with gray

      • formatGray

        public static int formatGray(int gray)
        format gray of one pixel if gray<0 format: gray=0 if gray>255 format: gray=255
        参数:
        gray - the gray of one pixel
        返回:
        the formated gray
